original_text: But Peter stayed outside by the gate. Then the other disciple went out again. He spoke to the girl who was watching at the gate. Then he brought Peter into the yard.
korean_text: 베드로는 문 밖에 서 있는지라 대제사장을 아는 그 다른 제자가 나가서 문 지키는 여자에게 말하여 베드로를 데리고 들어오니

sentences.original_text: But Peter stayed outside by the gate.
Then the other disciple went out again.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 다른 제자가 다시 밖으로 나갔습니다.

sentences.original_text: who was watching at the gate.
Then he brought Peter into the yard.
